arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen see off 10-man Freiburg to extend domestic run
arts.sum: Leverkusen gradually grew into the game, with Alejandro Grimaldo testing Noah Atubolu from a free-kick after Philipp Lienhart's foul had earned him the first of waht would eventually be two yellow cards. Bayer Leverkusen notched up a fourth-consecutive Bundesliga win under coach Kasper Hjulmand, with the Werkself seeing off the 10 men of Freiburg thanks to goals from Ernest Poku and Edmond Tapsoba.
